effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. This can also be used for crossing water.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. This can also be used for crossing water.
